mapper.select: SELECT order_date_m,sum(product_price) mSum FROM (SELECT product_price,TO_CHAR(order_date,'yyyy.mm') order_date_m FROM order_detail WHERE order_detail_status NOT IN ('환불','교환','취소')) GROUP BY order_date_m ORDER BY order_date_m

SELECT order_date_m,sum(product_price) mSum FROM (SELECT product_price,TO_CHAR(order_date,'yyyy.mm') order_date_m FROM order_detail WHERE order_detail_status NOT IN ('환불','교환','취소')) WHERE order_date_m BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{start_date},'yyyy.mm'),'yyyy.mm') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{end_date},'yyyy.mm'),'yyyy.mm') GROUP BY order_date_m ORDER BY order_date_m
SELECT product_name,sum(product_price) sum FROM (SELECT * FROM order_detail ORDER BY product_number) GROUP BY product_name
SELECT product_name,sum(product_price) sum FROM (SELECT * FROM order_detail ORDER BY product_number) WHERE ${cate} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' GROUP BY product_name
